text: Looking for Mr. Goodbar is a 1977 crime drama movie based on the book of the same name by Judith Rossner. It was directed by Richard Brooks and stars Diane Keaton, Tuesday Weld, William Atherton, Richard Gere, LeVar Burton, Brian Dennehy and Tom Berenger. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures and was nominated for two Oscars at the Academy Awards in 1978. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1977 crime drama movies Category:1977 LGBT movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Richard Brooks Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:Movies about sisters Category:Movies about educators Category:Movies about drugs Category:Movies about domestic violence Category:Movies about dysfunctional families
title: Looking for Mr. Goodbar (movie)
